favourite.article: Lord Jesus, thank You so much for Your grace! It is sufficient for me!

Lest my Poor Heart should forget it...He still keeps repeating the promise...His Grace is sufficient for me! Many times we fail the Lord and we tend to forget that His grace is sufficient to hold and keep us...To His own master, He stands or falls...Our standing is by the Lord! Maybe we are forgetful...but He keeps repeating the promise....Lord Your Grace is sufficient for me!

His strength is made perfect in weakness! His grace is sufficient for me! I appreciate this hymn so much. We need our Savior to tell us over and over and over that He NEEDS our weaknesses! Amen for sufficient grace.

I like the original tune, but I like this new tune even better. It is more joyful and uplifting.
I especially like verse 3, "His grace is sufficient for service, it sets us from selfishness free, and sends us to tell to the tried ones, 'His grace is sufficient for thee.'"
Wow, so WONDERFUL! His grace is so sufficient to us and is made perfect in our weaknesses. Oh, praise Him!! I love You very much my Lord.
Yes, His grace is sufficient for ME!
This hymn makes me feel joyful. I like it very much.
